bug.author: leezu
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started/build_from_source>https://mxnet.apache.org/get_started/build_from_source</denchmark-link> will always forward external visitors to <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/get_started/build_from_source.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/1.6/get_started/build_from_source.html</denchmark-link>
Sometimes we may wish to link the master docs. Currently there is no link, such as <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/master/get_started/build_from_source.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/versions/master/get_started/build_from_source.html</denchmark-link> available and it is impossible to link to websites in the master version documentation

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ys2843>@ys2843</denchmark-link> would it make sense to use a url schema like for master docs too, so that it won't break the links?
